DataElement.preferredName: Bone Marrow Biopsy Cellularity Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of percent cellularity in a bone marrow biopsy sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes._The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis._The determination of the amount of degree, quality or condition of cells present in a sample.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The soft, sponge-like tissue in the center of bones that produces white blood cells, red blood cells, and platelets.

Concepts.definition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.

Property.preferredDefinition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.:The determination of the amount of degree, quality or condition of cells present in a sample.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.
The determination of the amount of degree, quality or condition of cells present in a sample.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0368225 - FW: 19C0042 BM Bx and Aspirate Disease Assessment CRF curation request. 4/10/19 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed that is a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
